idea-plugin.name: Double Chord Keymap
idea-plugin.description:
A keymap for all IntelliJ-based IDEs where most shortcuts have two keystrokes: the first one defines a group and the second one defines an action in this group (e.g. 

Ctrl/Cmd+D, A
for Debug > Attach to Process or Ctrl/Cmd+N, U for Navigate > Find Usages).

You may want to try this keymap out if some of the following features are important to you:

  • Easy-to-remember mnemonic mappings
  • Same shortcuts across different operating systems
  • Fewer modifier keys
  • No conflicts with system shortcuts
  • No conflicts on non-English Latin keyboards
